name: Really Bad Movies Quiz | Name the Movie | 5 Questions

questions.text: The year is 2000, the movie starred John Travolta and Forrest Whitaker. The outcome - A BOMB!!
questions.explanation:
Battlefield Earth & 'Battlefirld Earth'.

	This L. Ron Hubbard adaptation was a major bomb.

questions.text: This 1987 Bill Cosby bomb featured Joe Don Baker and Jane Fonda.
questions.explanation:
'Leonard Part 6'.

	Makes you wonder what in the world Bill Cosby was thinking.

questions.text: Lewis Skolnick, Ogre, Lamar, Takashi to name a few of the Nerds get together in this 1994 movie to celebrate the wedding of Booger. 'Revenge of the Nerds:
This 1994 movie about a character featured on Saturday Night Live. Julia Sweeney plays this questionable character. What is the character's name?
questions.explanation:
Pat.

	It's Pat. I could never figure it out either.

questions.text: This 1994 movie is the absolute worst of this series. These Police Academy regulars are given a 'Mission to ________:
questions.explanation:
'Moscow'.

	OK, this is one movie that has had about three too many sequels.
